'''''It All Comes Tumbling Down''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to paralyze the [[Everlasting Lord of Arcane Wisdom]] in Phase 1 by activating both Electro matrices.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement may be a reference to the lyrics of one of the songs used in the ''{{w|Neon Genesis Evangelion}}'' film ''{{w|The End of Evangelion}}'', "[[w:c:evangelion:Komm, süsser Tod|Komm, süsser Tod]]."
* The Chinese and Japanese names of this achievement and [[Causality of Birth and Extinction]] are quotes from {{ja|{{w|Zeami_Motokiyo#Kakyo|花鏡}}|Kakyou|The Mirror of the Flower,}} a treatise by the famous Noh actor and playwright {{W|Zeami Motokiyo}}: {{ja|生死の去来するは、棚頭の傀儡たり。一線断ゆる時、落落磊磊。|tl=Life and death come and go, like a puppet on the stage. When one string is cut, it all falls apart.}}
